title: DisplacementEvent
description: A displacement event is a description of the age, environment and process of a shear displacement event.

eventEnvironment.title: eventEnvironment
eventEnvironment.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">eventEnvironment</font> property (<font color="#4f81bd">SWE::Category</font>) is a category from a controlled vocabulary identifying the physical setting within which a <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicEvent</font> takes place. Event environment is construed broadly to include physical settings on the Earth surface specified by climate, tectonics, physiography or geography, and settings in the Earthâ€™s interior specified by pressure, temperature, chemical environment, or tectonics.

eventEnvironment_nullReason.title: Reason for null value in property eventEnvironment

eventProcess.title: eventProcess
eventProcess.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">eventProcess:EventProcessTerm</font> property provides a term from a controlled vocabulary specifying the process or processes that occurred during the event. Examples include deposition, extrusion, intrusion, cooling.

eventProcess_nullReason.title: Reason for null value in property eventProcess

numericAge.title: numericAge
numericAge.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">numericAge:NumericAgeRange</font> property provides an age in absolute year before present (BP).  Present is defined by convention to be January 1<sup>st</sup> 1950 (although van der Plitch & Hogg , suggests this convention to be restricted to radiocarbon estimations).

numericAge_nullReason.title: Reason for null value in property numericAge

olderNamedAge.title: olderNamedAge
olderNamedAge.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">olderNamedAge:GeochronologicalEraTerm</font> defines the older boundary of age of an event expressed using a geochronologic era defined according to a geologic time scale as per the <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicTime</font> schema (eg, the International Commission on Stratigraphy Chronostratigraphic Chart - http://www.stratigraphy.org/index.php/ics-chart-timescale).

olderNamedAge_nullReason.title: Reason for null value in property olderNamedAge

youngerNamedAge.title: youngerNamedAge
youngerNamedAge.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">youngerNamedAge:GeochronologicalEraTerm</font> defines the younger boundary of age of event expressed using a geochronologic era defined according to a geologic time scale per the <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicTime</font> schema. (eg, the International Commission on Stratigraphy Chronostratigraphic Chart - http://www.stratigraphy.org/index.php/ics-chart-timescale).

youngerNamedAge_nullReason.title: Reason for null value in property youngerNamedAge

gaEventDescription.title: gaEventDescription
gaEventDescription.description: The property geEventDescription:GeologicEventAbstractDescription contains a detailed event description.  This is a stub property in GeoSciML Basic since GeologicEventAbstractDescription is abstract and with subtypes defined in GeoSciML Extension.

gaEventDescription_nullReason.title: Reason for null value in property gaEventDescription

incrementalDisplacement.title: incrementalDisplacement
incrementalDisplacement.description: The incrementalDisplacement:DisplacementValue property contains a DisplacementValue reporting the parameters of the displacement.

incrementalDisplacement_nullReason.title: Reason for null value in property incrementalDisplacement
